label: uncl7111
comment: Code specifying the value of a characteristic.

values.label: Chest/bust width
values.comment: The measurement around the widest part of the chest/bust.

values.label: Hip width
values.comment: The measurement around the fullest part of the hips.

values.label: Outside leg length
values.comment: The measurement of the outside leg seam. This is the distance from the waist to the bottom of the trousers.
